descriptions:
Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths â€“ the ultimate holiday decor solution for your home, shop, or hotel! This enchanting set includes 1 stunning lighted Christmas wreath adorned with pine cones and red berries, 2 mesmerizing LED-lit garlands, and 2 elegant red bows, all beautifully crafted from PE synthetic fir.

The garlands, measuring an impressive 106 inches long with a 10-inch diameter and 315 branch tips each, create a delightful cascade of warm yellow LED lights, perfect for draping over your fireplace, mantel, or porch. The wreath, with a generous diameter of 17.72 inches, adds a touch of holiday magic to your front door or as a festive addition to your Christmas tree.

Each set includes 2 red bows, measuring 23.6 inches wide and 13.8 inches tall, adding a pop of color and festive cheer. The battery-operated lights ensure a hassle-free, wire-free setup, making these decorations ideal for homes, living rooms, or Christmas parties.

With multiple placement options, including front doors, fireplaces, Christmas trees, mantels, porches, cabinets, and shelves, the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths is the perfect way to spread holiday cheer and create unforgettable memories this Christmas. Order yours today and let the festivities begin!
